CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Microsoft Lists -  Rules packaged into out-of-the-box List templates
CurrentVersion.description: Several of the out-of-box list templates will now come with rules pre-packaged into them, to help you keep you and your team members notified of distinct changes in your list items. This item is no longer accurate and is being removed from the roadmap.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Microsoft Lists -  Rules packaged into out-of-the-box List templates
OldVersion.description: Several of the out-of-box list templates will now come with rules pre-packaged into them, to help you keep you and your team members notified of distinct changes in your list items.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Microsoft Lists -  -  New Lookup column type support
CurrentVersion.description: Create Lookup columns in modern list user interface - no settings page required. This means you can program a list item (column) to 'lookup' another set of data of pre-populated, managed choices. We are pleased to expand the columns types that are now supported when 'looking up' from the other list: Boolean (Yes/No), choice, and multi choice - plus formatting. This item is no longer accurate and is being removed from the roadmap.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Microsoft Lists -  -  New Lookup column type support
OldVersion.description: Create Lookup columns in modern list user interface - no settings page required. This means you can program a list item (column) to 'lookup' another set of data of pre-populated, managed choices. We are pleased to expand the columns types that are now supported when 'looking up' from the other list: Boolean (Yes/No), choice, and multi choice - plus formatting.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Sharing experiences - simplifying link settings
CurrentVersion.description: We're improving Link settings by providing more helpful tooltips, definitions and clearer language to help you understand which link type and permissions best suit your needs prior to sharing a file or folder with your coworkers. This item is no longer accurate and is being removed from the roadmap.

OldVersion.title: OneDrive: Sharing experiences - simplifying link settings
OldVersion.description: We're improving Link settings by providing more helpful tooltips, definitions and clearer language to help you understand which link type and permissions best suit your needs prior to sharing a file or folder with your coworkers.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Compliant Team Meetings
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance policies can be configured to analyze Microsoft Teams meeting transcripts for potential policy matches. Teams meeting transcripts are only generated when meeting organizers opt in to meeting recording. Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA) and business conduct violations, such as inappropriate sharing of sensitive/confidential information, adult content, and using harassing or threatening language. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy. Note: We are adjusting the roadmap release phase and adding additional cloud instances to reflect the current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Compliant Team Meetings
OldVersion.description: ,Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance policies can be configured to analyze Microsoft Teams meeting transcripts for potential policy matches. Teams meeting transcripts are only generated when meeting organizers opt in to meeting recording. Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA) and business conduct violations, such as inappropriate sharing of sensitive/confidential information, adult content, and using harassing or threatening language. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy. Note: We are adjusting the roadmap release phase and adding additional cloud instances to reflect the current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New calendar views on Teams Rooms on Android
CurrentVersion.description: The calendar on Teams Rooms on Android gets a new look and expanded functionalities. Users can view the calendar for the current and next day. Any available 11 minute or more time slots are shown. A visual indicator (green/purple vertical bar) is added to each time slot for users to easily see whether a room is booked or available. Available in all Teams Rooms licenses.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New calendar views on Teams Rooms on Android
OldVersion.description: The calendar on Teams Rooms on Android gets a new look and expanded functionalities. Users can view the calendar for the current and next day. Any available 11 minute or more time slots are shown. A visual indicator (green/purple vertical bar) is added to each time slot for users to easily see whether a room is booked or available. Available in all Teams Rooms licenses.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Improved View switcher and Front of Room display controls for Teams Rooms on Android
CurrentVersion.description: The updated interface for the Teams Rooms on Android View Switcher menu provides end users with more control of the front of room display(s) during a meeting and enables customizations including visibility of the meeting chat and which meeting component is displayed on the left and right panel for Front Row. IT admins can configure the default number of panels and default component on panel(s) using the local device setting.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Improved View switcher and Front of Room display controls for Teams Rooms on Android
OldVersion.description: The updated interface for the Teams Rooms on Android View Switcher menu provides end users with more control of the front of room display(s) during a meeting and enables customizations including visibility of the meeting chat and which meeting component is displayed on the left and right panel for Front Row. IT admins can configure the default number of panels and default component on panel(s) using the local device setting.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Pick a local folder for saving attachments
CurrentVersion.description: Users are now able to pick a folder when saving an attachment in the new Outlook for Windows. This feature was rolled back to address some critical user feedback; we apologize for any inconvenience.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Pick a local folder for saving attachments
OldVersion.description: Users are now able to pick a folder when saving an attachment in the new Outlook for Windows. This feature was rolled back to address some critical user feedback; we apologize for any inconvenience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Click-to-Chat with Teams App Publishers
CurrentVersion.description: This feature enables users of Teams Admin Center to quickly and easily open a private Teams chat between themselves and a third-party app publisher to directly ask questions on pricing, compliance or other topics as they consider the deployment and/or purchase of the app.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Click-to-Chat with Teams App Publishers
OldVersion.description: This feature enables users of Teams Admin Center to quickly and easily open a private Teams chat between themselves and a third-party app publisher to directly ask questions on pricing, compliance or other topics as they consider the deployment and/or purchase of the app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: False positive email release from Quarantine through threat explorer, email summary panel, advanced hunting, and custom detection email entity page take action
CurrentVersion.description: ,SecOps can now mange False positives and take move to inbox (i.e. release) quarantined messages from Threat explorer, advanced hunting, custom detection and Email entity page without the need to tab out to the Quarantine portal to take the action.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: False positive email release from Quarantine through threat explorer, email summary panel, advanced hunting, and custom detection email entity page take action
OldVersion.description: ,SecOps can now mange False positives and take move to inbox (i.e. release) quarantined messages from Threat explorer, advanced hunting, custom detection and Email entity page without the need to tab out to the Quarantine portal to take the action.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Audio and video flyout and settings in Teams meetings
CurrentVersion.description: The Audio and Video Flyout is designed to make it easier and more efficient for users to manage their audio and video settings during Teams meetings. Users can easily toggle features on and off with visual indicators for both audio and video settings, eliminating the need to navigate deep into the settings menu to make adjustments.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Audio and video flyout and settings in Teams meetings
OldVersion.description: The Audio and Video Flyout is designed to make it easier and more efficient for users to manage their audio and video settings during Teams meetings. Users can easily toggle features on and off with visual indicators for both audio and video settings, eliminating the need to navigate deep into the settings menu to make adjustments.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Latest meeting experiences with performance improvements on web for Safari and Firefox (for anonymous join only)
CurrentVersion.description: The latest Teams meeting experiences will be available for Teams on the web in Safari and Firefox browsers - including performance improvements, refreshed pre-join, updated meeting stage, and the updated meeting toolbar. (for anonymous join only)

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Latest meeting experiences with performance improvements on web for Safari and Firefox (for anonymous join only)
OldVersion.description: The latest Teams meeting experiences will be available for Teams on the web in Safari and Firefox browsers - including performance improvements, refreshed pre-join, updated meeting stage, and the updated meeting toolbar. (for anonymous join only)

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Citations for Copilot in Teams meetings available on mobile
CurrentVersion.description: Now available on mobile, Copilot in Teams responses have a citation number at the end of each Copilot statement that provides detail on the meeting artifact or source that Copilot used to generate the response, like the meeting transcript. Users can select the citation to see which speaker the citation is attributed to, the exact quote from the transcript, as well as the time stamp of the quote in the transcript. Selecting a reference number will open a transcript viewer that displays the source of the response.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Citations for Copilot in Teams meetings available on mobile
OldVersion.description: Now available on mobile, Copilot in Teams responses have a citation number at the end of each Copilot statement that provides detail on the meeting artifact or source that Copilot used to generate the response, like the meeting transcript. Users can select the citation to see which speaker the citation is attributed to, the exact quote from the transcript, as well as the time stamp of the quote in the transcript. Selecting a reference number will open a transcript viewer that displays the source of the response.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Use Draft with Copilot in Word based on text, list, or table selection
CurrentVersion.description: Use Draft with Copilot in Word with the on-canvas Copilot menu when a user selects text, a list, or a table, which generates new content from Copilot and provides a richer, more interactive experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Find the perfect visual with Copilot and Designer in Word
CurrentVersion.description:
Copilot in Word now integrates with Designer to
 help you find the perfect image or create a banner to bring your document to life.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Find the perfect visual with Copilot and Designer in Word
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in Word now integrates with Designer to help you find the perfect image or create a banner to bring your document to life.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Use Draft with Copilot in Word based on text, list, or table selection
CurrentVersion.description: Use Draft with Copilot in Word with the on-canvas Copilot menu when a user selects text, a list, or a table. This generates new content from Copilot and provides a richer, more interactive experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Registration Form Updates in Webinars
CurrentVersion.description: Organizers can rearrange the sequence of registration form questions that are presented to attendees during the webinar registration process. The questions available for reordering include address, city, state, zip/post code, country/region, job title organization, industry, and custom questions.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Registration Form Updates in Webinars
OldVersion.description: Organizers can rearrange the sequence of registration form questions that are presented to attendees during the webinar registration process. The questions available for reordering include address, city, state, zip/post code, country/region, job title organization, industry, and custom questions.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Find the perfect visual with Copilot + Designer in Word
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in Word now integrates with Designer to help you find the perfect image or create a banner to bring your document to life

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting recap and meeting artifacts automatically shared in chat after meeting
CurrentVersion.description: Shortly after a meeting ends, meeting participants will automatically get a set of all the artifacts from the meeting in the meeting chat. Included in this set is a quick entry point to the meeting recap page, the transcript, the recording, Collaborative notes, any files that were shared, a link to any Whiteboard that was used, and the meeting details like date and time of the meeting event. For users with access to intelligent recap, in addition to the entry point to intelligent recap, users will also see highlights like number of speakers, number of name mentions, and suggested tasks.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting recap and meeting artifacts automatically shared in chat after meeting
OldVersion.description: Shortly after a meeting ends, meeting participants will automatically get a set of all the artifacts from the meeting in the meeting chat. Included in this set is a quick entry point to the meeting recap page, the transcript, the recording, Collaborative notes, any files that were shared, a link to any Whiteboard that was used, and the meeting details like date and time of the meeting event. For users with access to intelligent recap, in addition to the entry point to intelligent recap, users will also see highlights like number of speakers, number of name mentions, and suggested tasks.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Updated teams and channels onboarding flow
CurrentVersion.description: When added to a new team, users can see which channels the team owner recommended, and select to show only the channels that are relevant to them.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Updated teams and channels onboarding flow
OldVersion.description: When added to a new team, users can see which channels the team owner recommended, and select to show only the channels that are relevant to them.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Extending support for viewing MIP Protected PDF Files to different sovereignties (including GCCH)
CurrentVersion.description: ,Sovereign cloud customers (including GCCH) will be able to open MIP protected PDF content in Microsoft Edge. This change will be available in the Microsoft Edge built-in PDF reader powered by Adobe Acrobat and the legacy Microsoft Edge PDF engine.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Extending support for viewing MIP Protected PDF Files to different sovereignties (including GCCH)
OldVersion.description: Sovereign cloud customers (including GCCH) will be able to open MIP protected PDF content in Microsoft Edge. This change will be available in the Microsoft Edge built-in PDF reader powered by Adobe Acrobat and the legacy Microsoft Edge PDF engine.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Share to Teams will be added to the ribbon in the new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Users will now be able to find a "Share to Teams" button in the ribbon whenever they select an email in the reading pane. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Share to Teams will be added to the ribbon in the new Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: Users will now be able to find a "Share to Teams" button in the ribbon whenever they select an email in the reading pane. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Live Share support for Chat, Channel, and Collaborative Stageview tab applications
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Teams applications that use Live Share for building real-time collaborative experiences – previously limited to Meeting Stage and Side Panel tabs – will be able to extend to Chat, Channel, and Collaborative Stageview tabs on desktop and web. Live Share enables collaborative features such as co-watching, co-creating, and co-editing content in real time. All applications enabled in your tenant using the existing Live Share permission will be eligible for this feature.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Live Share support for Chat, Channel, and Collaborative Stageview tab applications
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Teams applications that use Live Share for building real-time collaborative experiences – previously limited to Meeting Stage and Side Panel tabs – will be able to extend to Chat, Channel, and Collaborative Stageview tabs on desktop and web. Live Share enables collaborative features such as co-watching, co-creating, and co-editing content in real time. All applications enabled in your tenant using the existing Live Share permission will be eligible for this feature.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent call recap (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: The Calls app in Teams will soon have AI-generated notes and action items from your calls, so you can pay attention to your conversations and save time coordinating next steps. Intelligent call recap will work for both VoIP and PSTN calls, and summaries will be generated from calls for which transcription was enabled.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Updating all News Posts to "Made for Email"
CurrentVersion.description: Following the positive reception of the "Made for Email" News templates, we are rolling out a change that will make every news post you create "Made for Email" by default. Now, no matter how you create your new News Post, whether it is copying a previous post or using an existing template, you will have access to send that full distribution as an email.  With this change, authors will still have access to our full webpart library by selecting "all" webparts in the webpart picker but are defaulted into having additional sending functionality.

CurrentVersion.title: Azure Active Directory: verifiable credentials
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Verifiable credentials let organizations confirm information about someone without collecting and storing their personal data. Organizations will be able to issue digital versions of a variety of credentials such as physical badges, loyalty cards, and government-issued paper documents based on open standards.  The Public Preview is currently available.  We have updated this item to reflect the upcoming General Availability month.

OldVersion.title: Azure Active Directory: verifiable credentials
OldVersion.description: ,Verifiable credentials let organizations confirm information about someone without collecting and storing their personal data. Organizations will be able to issue digital versions of a variety of credentials such as physical badges, loyalty cards, and government-issued paper documents based on open standards.  The Public Preview is currently available.  We have updated this item to reflect the upcoming General Availability month.

CurrentVersion.title: OneNote: Dictate your notes in OneNote
CurrentVersion.description: Dictation with commanding available in both OneNote Web and Windows. You can use speech to text instead of typing and various commands, such as delete, to edit your notes.

OldVersion.title: OneNote: Dictate your notes in OneNote
OldVersion.description: Dictation with commanding available in both OneNote Web and Windows. You can use speech to text instead of typing and various commands, such as delete, to edit your notes.

CurrentVersion.title: PowerPoint: Organization Fonts in PowerPoint for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will allow organizations to add their custom fonts into PowerPoint.

OldVersion.title: PowerPoint: Organization Fonts in PowerPoint for Windows
OldVersion.description: This feature will allow organizations to add their custom fonts into PowerPoint.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Attack Simulation Training APIs
CurrentVersion.description: We’re onboarding Attack Simulation Training Read APIs to the Microsoft Graph, providing a unified interface and schema to integrate with security solutions from Microsoft, as well as integrate with downstream systems and ecosystem partners.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Attack Simulation Training APIs
OldVersion.description: We’re onboarding Attack Simulation Training Read APIs to the Microsoft Graph, providing a unified interface and schema to integrate with security solutions from Microsoft, as well as integrate with downstream systems and ecosystem partners.

CurrentVersion.title: Word: Editor Text Predictions in Word for Mac
CurrentVersion.description: Editor Text Predictions in Word for Mac accelerates your writing by predicting text as you type.

OldVersion.title: Word: Editor Text Predictions in Word for Mac
OldVersion.description: Editor Text Predictions in Word for Mac accelerates your writing by predicting text as you type.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Exchange Server Software Updates
CurrentVersion.description:
,
This report provides admins with information about their on-premises Exchange servers. The data is curated from multiple sources and provides details on Exchange server update status.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Exchange Server Software Updates
OldVersion.description:
,
This report provides admins with information about their on-premises Exchange servers. The data is curated from multiple sources and provides details on Exchange server update status.

CurrentVersion.title: Azure Active Directory: Multiple Password less Phone sign-in Accounts for iOS Devices
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Users can enable password less phone sign-in accounts for their iOS devices. Previously there was a limit of one password less phone sign-in account per device, but we have removed that limitation.

OldVersion.title: Azure Active Directory: Multiple Password less Phone sign-in Accounts for iOS Devices
OldVersion.description:
,
Users can enable password less phone sign-in accounts for their iOS devices. Previously there was a limit of one password less phone sign-in account per device, but we have removed that limitation.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Bulk Automated Rename
CurrentVersion.description: When OneDrive can't sync a file or folder because its name contains invalid characters, OneDrive can sometimes rename it for you. During automatic renaming, OneDrive replaces each invalid character with an underscore.

OldVersion.title: OneDrive: Bulk Automated Rename
OldVersion.description: When OneDrive can't sync a file or folder because its name contains invalid characters, OneDrive can sometimes rename it for you. During automatic renaming, OneDrive replaces each invalid character with an underscore.

CurrentVersion.title: Word: Updated design for Office Dictation
CurrentVersion.description: The Office dictation toolbar has been redesigned to showcase new visuals, responsive UI, and a smaller design to stay out of the way of what matters - your content!

OldVersion.title: Word: Updated design for Office Dictation
OldVersion.description: The Office dictation toolbar has been redesigned to showcase new visuals, responsive UI, and a smaller design to stay out of the way of what matters - your content!

CurrentVersion.title: Office app: Read Aloud works during screen lock on iOS devices
CurrentVersion.description: Now you can listen to your documents on mobile when screen is locked.

OldVersion.title: Office app: Read Aloud works during screen lock on iOS devices
OldVersion.description: Now you can listen to your documents on mobile when screen is locked.

CurrentVersion.title: Office app: Read Aloud works during screen lock on Android devices
CurrentVersion.description: Listen to your documents on mobile when screen is locked.

OldVersion.title: Office app: Read Aloud works during screen lock on Android devices
OldVersion.description: Listen to your documents on mobile when screen is locked.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Stream tile in Microsoft 365 app launcher enabled for GCC-H and DOD
CurrentVersion.description: ,Stream tile in Microsoft 365 app launcher will be enabled for GCC-H and DOD and users will be able to use the Stream tile to go to the Stream Start Page on office.com. The Stream tile will be visible for GCC-H and DOD tenants having the SharePoint service plan enabled.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Stream tile in Microsoft 365 app launcher enabled for GCC-H and DOD
OldVersion.description: ,Stream tile in Microsoft 365 app launcher will be enabled for GCC-H and DOD and users will be able to use the Stream tile to go to the Stream Start Page on office.com. The Stream tile will be visible for GCC-H and DOD tenants having the SharePoint service plan enabled.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft To Do: Custom background
CurrentVersion.description: Now, you can set custom backgrounds from your gallery to your lists on Microsoft To do! This item is no longer accurate and is being removed from the roadmap.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft To Do: Custom background
OldVersion.description: Now, you can set custom backgrounds from your gallery to your lists on Microsoft To do!

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Identity: User activity timeline in Microsoft 365 Defender
CurrentVersion.description: ,Using the activity timeline from the Microsoft Defender for Identity portal as inspiration, this release will provide a dedicated tab on the user page in Microsoft 365 Defender that contains a full user activity timeline, detailing all activities and alerts from relevant workloads associated with that identity. This item is no longer accurate and is being removed from the roadmap.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Identity: User activity timeline in Microsoft 365 Defender
OldVersion.description:
,
Using the activity timeline from the Microsoft Defender for Identity portal as inspiration, this release will provide a dedicated tab on the user page in Microsoft 365 Defender that contains a full user activity timeline, detailing all activities and alerts from relevant workloads associated with that identity.

All applications enabled in your tenant using the existing Live Share permission will be eligible for this feature.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent call recap (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: The Calls app in Teams will soon have AI-generated notes and action items from your calls, so you can pay attention to your conversations and save time coordinating next steps. Intelligent call recap will work for both VoIP and PSTN calls, and summaries will be generated from calls for which transcription was enabled.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Updating all News Posts to "Made for Email"
CurrentVersion.description: Following the positive reception of the "Made for Email" News templates, we are rolling out a change that will make every news post you create "Made for Email" by default. Now, no matter how you create your new News Post, whether it is copying a previous post or using an existing template, you will have access to send that full distribution as an email.  With this change, authors will still have access to our full webpart library by selecting "all" webparts in the webpart picker but are defaulted into having additional sending functionality.

CurrentVersion.title: Azure Active Directory: verifiable credentials
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Verifiable credentials let organizations confirm information about someone without collecting and storing their personal data. Organizations will be able to issue digital versions of a variety of credentials such as physical badges, loyalty cards, and government-issued paper documents based on open standards.  The Public Preview is currently available.  We have updated this item to reflect the upcoming General Availability month.

CurrentVersion.title: OneNote: Dictate your notes in OneNote
CurrentVersion.description: Dictation with commanding available in both OneNote Web and Windows. You can use speech to text instead of typing and various commands, such as delete, to edit your notes.

CurrentVersion.title: PowerPoint: Organization Fonts in PowerPoint for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will allow organizations to add their custom fonts into PowerPoint.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Attack Simulation Training APIs
CurrentVersion.description: We’re onboarding Attack Simulation Training Read APIs to the Microsoft Graph, providing a unified interface and schema to integrate with security solutions from Microsoft, as well as integrate with downstream systems and ecosystem partners.

CurrentVersion.title: Word: Editor Text Predictions in Word for Mac
CurrentVersion.description: Editor Text Predictions in Word for Mac accelerates your writing by predicting text as you type.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Exchange Server Software Updates
CurrentVersion.description:
,
This report provides admins with information about their on-premises Exchange servers. The data is curated from multiple sources and provides details on Exchange server update status.

CurrentVersion.title: Azure Active Directory: Multiple Password less Phone sign-in Accounts for iOS Devices
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Users can enable password less phone sign-in accounts for their iOS devices. Previously there was a limit of one password less phone sign-in account per device, but we have removed that limitation.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Bulk Automated Rename
CurrentVersion.description: When OneDrive can't sync a file or folder because its name contains invalid characters, OneDrive can sometimes rename it for you. During automatic renaming, OneDrive replaces each invalid character with an underscore.

CurrentVersion.title: Word: Updated design for Office Dictation
CurrentVersion.description: The Office dictation toolbar has been redesigned to showcase new visuals, responsive UI, and a smaller design to stay out of the way of what matters - your content!

CurrentVersion.title: Office app: Read Aloud works during screen lock on iOS devices
CurrentVersion.description: Now you can listen to your documents on mobile when screen is locked.

CurrentVersion.title: Office app: Read Aloud works during screen lock on Android devices
CurrentVersion.description: Listen to your documents on mobile when screen is locked.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Stream tile in Microsoft 365 app launcher enabled for GCC-H and DOD
CurrentVersion.description: ,Stream tile in Microsoft 365 app launcher will be enabled for GCC-H and DOD and users will be able to use the Stream tile to go to the Stream Start Page on office.com. The Stream tile will be visible for GCC-H and DOD tenants having the SharePoint service plan enabled.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft To Do: Custom background
CurrentVersion.description: Now, you can set custom backgrounds from your gallery to your lists on Microsoft To do! This item is no longer accurate and is being removed from the roadmap.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Identity: User activity timeline in Microsoft 365 Defender
CurrentVersion.description: ,Using the activity timeline from the Microsoft Defender for Identity portal as inspiration, this release will provide a dedicated tab on the user page in Microsoft 365 Defender that contains a full user activity timeline, detailing all activities and alerts from relevant workloads associated with that identity. This item is no longer accurate and is being removed from the roadmap.
